decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Site Plans Proposed Site Plan, Plans Proposed 0. GF- Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Plans Proposed 1. 01-Proposed First Floor Plan, Plans Proposed 1. 01- Proposed First Floor Context Plan, Plans Proposed 2. RF-Proposed Roof Plan, Elevations Proposed Proposed Front Elevation, Elevations Proposed Proposed Rear Elevation, Elevations Proposed Proposed Side 01 Elevation, Elevations Proposed Proposed Side 02 Elevation, Sections Proposed Proposed Section AA, Sections Proposed Proposed Section BB, Sections Existing Section BB, Sections Existing Existing Section AA, Elevations Existing Existing Side 02 Elevation, Elevations Existing Existing Side 01 Elevation, Elevations Existing Existing Rear Elevation, Elevations Existing Existing Front Elevation, Plans Existing 2. RF- Existing Roof Plan, Plans Existing 1, 01- Existing First Floor Plan, Plans Existing 0. GF- Existing Ground Floor Plan, Location Plan, Design & Access Statement; Reasonable Exception Statement
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey extensions to both sides; two storey rear extension; oreal window to rear at ground floor level; two side dormers; rooflight in dormer roof; decking to rear; external alterations (demolition of attached garage, side extension and outbuilding)
